# RANDU Exposed

## RANDU Output

```{r testgl1, webgl=TRUE}
seed <- as.double(1)
RANDU <- function() {
    seed <<- ((2^16 + 3) * seed) %% (2^31)
    seed/(2^31)
}

set.seed(10)
dat <- t(sapply(1:2000, function(i){
    U <- c(RANDU(), RANDU(), RANDU(), RANDU(), RANDU())
    round(U[1:3], 6)
}))


plot3d(dat, col="black", size=3)
```

## R Random Uniform Output
